original_text: And the name of the star is called Wormwood: and the third part of the waters became wormwood; and many men died of the waters, because they were made bitter.
korean_text: 이 별 이름은 쓴 쑥이라 물의 삼분의 일이 쓴 쑥이 되매 그 물이 쓴 물이 되므로 많은 사람이 죽더라

sentences.original_text: And the name of the star is called Wormwood:
and the third part of the waters became wormwood;
sentences.korean_translation: 물의 세 번째 부분이 쓸개나무가 되었으며

sentences.original_text: and many men died of the waters,
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 그 물들로 인해 죽었으니
